entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:10 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 02:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero.
